p: EPA and DHA are concentrated in fatty fish and marine mammals and these are the main source in the eastern diet. n-3 PUFAs are also commercially available as dietary supplements in the form of oil and capsules. In 2008, the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) have formally stated that consumption of up to 3 g/d of marine-based n-3 PUFAs is generally regarded as safe.
